channel.title: My first sig!
channel.description: well actually my second but my first was shit on a stick :rolleyes: i reckon this one is ok but i need professional criticism to help me. by the way tell me how to improve text cos i really dont know how to make look good[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 09:22:12 PM[/size][hr]how do i hav 10 rep? this is my second post lol[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 09:27:01 PM[/size][hr][URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/2224/secondsig6yp.png[/img][/URL][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 09:29:14 PM[/size][hr]i put it in my sig its not comeing up!

item.title: My first sig!
item.dc:creator: @Zigon Zigon
item.description:
@Zigon wrote:

Not bad for a second sig. For the font try using “stroke” I think it’s called, sometimes that helps me when I try to make the font stick out a little more.
